product_details.description: Quartz Movement 20mm Case Diameter Mineral Crystal Water resistant to 50M Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a stylish and modern layout for promoting a vintage gold wristwatch. The background features geometric overlays in midnight navy, muted gold, and dark bronze, accented with subtle dotted patterns and vertical gradient bars. There is a prominent heading ("heading") in bold white font drawing attention, followed by a golden-toned subheading ("subheading") that evokes luxury. A fine horizontal line ("decorative") adds separation. The features list ("description") is aligned vertically in white, complementing the left panel. The price tag ("price") is bold and eye-catching in white. A rectangular button ("cta_background") with contrasting dark text ("cta") prompts users to shop, and a prominent cut-out style product image ("product_image") overlaps the angled background for depth.

**Color Palette**:
- Midnight Navy: #1A2238  
- Muted Gold: #C6A962  
- Pale Gold: #E6CA74  
- Dark Bronze: #9C8032  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image features a stylish Casio gold digital watch, dominated by a luxurious metallic gold color (#D4AF37) that represents sophistication and elegance. The body and strap are brushed gold, selectively highlighted with deeper golden shadows (#B8860B) and subtle reflections, giving a polished yet bold effect. The digital screen uses a soft beige background (#F5F5DC) contrasted with clean black text (#000000) for clarity and visibility. The transition between metallic shine and matte digital texture highlights key functional areas without overwhelming the design. An advertisement banner can use a palette of #D4AF37, #B8860B, #F5F5DC, #000000, and a light bronze (#CBA135) for harmony and refinement.
